title: "Circuit Glow"
content: Welcome to Circuit Glow, your go-to destination for neon-colored circuitry wallpapers! Our website features a wide variety of high-quality, repeating patterns of circuitry set against a sleek black background. Whether you're looking to add some futuristic flair to your desktop or spice up your phone's lock screen, we've got you covered. Our wallpapers are perfect for tech enthusiasts, gamers, and anyone who loves a good cyberpunk aesthetic. With our easy-to-use download system, you can have your new wallpaper in just a few clicks. So why wait? Give your device the glow-up it deserves with Circuit Glow.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of neon-colored circuitry, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
